articles.title: Twitter restores suicide prevention feature after Reuters report - Reuters
articles.description: Twitter Inc has restored a feature that promotes suicide prevention hotlines and other safety resources to users looking up certain content, after coming under pressure from some users and consumer safety groups over its removal.
articles.content: NEW YORK, Dec 24 (Reuters) - Twitter Inc has restored a feature that promotes suicide prevention hotlines and other safety resources to users looking up certain content, after coming under pressure f… [+3050 chars]
